project.name: TCP Client Hello Example
project.description: A Java Activity contacts a remote TCP server and tells the server when the activity activates and deactivates.

property.name: space.comm.tcp.server.host
property.description: The DNS name or IP address for the TCP server to be contacted. It defaults to localhost.

property.name: space.comm.tcp.server.port
property.description: The network port for the TCP server to be contacted.
